statements: UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET post_text = 'New post content' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 4.5 WHERE user_id = 123 AND post_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment_analysis SET username = 'JohnDoe', post_date = '2022-09-20', sentiment_score = 3.2 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE analysts SET analyst_specialization = 'Data Science' WHERE analyst_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_data SET sentiment_score = 4.5, post_date = '2022-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE data_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-1e2f3a4b5c6d';
UPDATE analysts SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', analyst_specialization = 'Marketing' WHERE analyst_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_text = 'Exciting news!', sentiment_score = 0.8, post_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE data_id = '987e6543-a21b-42c3-d456-789014432100';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE tweets SET content='Updated tweet content' WHERE tweet_id=10;
UPDATE users SET email = 'example_update1@email.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE tweets SET content = 'Updated content for tweet' WHERE tweet_id = 100;
UPDATE public.tweets SET tweet_text = 'Updated tweet text' WHERE tweet_id = 12345;
UPDATE public.analysis_results SET analyst_name = 'John Doe', analysis_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE analysis_id = 56789;
UPDATE public.twitter_users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE public.analysis_results SET analyst_name = 'Alice Smith', analysis_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE analysis_id = 456;
UPDATE SocialMediaUsers SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE SentimentAnalysisResults SET analysis_result = 'Positive' WHERE analysis_id = 1;
UPDATE PoliticalAnalysts SET analyst_role = 'Lead Analyst', analyst_name = 'John Doe' WHERE analyst_id = 3;
